attributes.action: declare March 18th (and the 19th) a national holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our esteemed friend/drinking bud/abusive troll known to many as the 'Darrall' will be back in the UK. We would love to have the 18th declared a national trolliday so we can go out drinking with him. We'd need the 19th as well to recover, but promise not to wasted NHS resources.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
